title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
itunes:title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP talks about the possibility of seeing College Football Playoff expansion soon. ESPN's David Pollack calls in to preview this weekend's biggest games in College Football. And Movie critic Richard Roeper settles a debate about Paulie's favorite movie.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
